tweet: Minister and Premier, you are putting children and ECEs at risk forcing them back, without a plan in three days.  Have you learned NOTHING from the disaster in LTC.  You are showing your politics and the economy mean more than the lives of children and ECEs. Is K-12 next?

On Monday night, I personally contacted @binance to inform them that a few of their users had exploited a (now fixed) vulnerability on BuyCoins to withdraw more ETH & LTC than they owned to their Binance accounts. (Please note that all users funds are safe!)

If you live in for-profit LTC in Ontario, you're 5x more likely to die from #COVID19 compared to municipal/non-profit residents  Homes were asked to upgrade 22 years ago. The vast majority that didn't are for-profit  Get profit out of senior long-term care  https://t.co/ZLK6DPTByA

Yes, we need strict infection control rules in long-term care facilities, but almost 3 months into the pandemic, we need to find more humane ways (not solitary confinement) to protect those living in #LTC & retirement homes. #Seniors need to interact with their families. #onpoli

The number of #Litecoin Lightning nodes has grown to 308 with a 2.78% increase over the past 30 days.  The number of LTC channels opened has grown to 693, an increase of 3.3% over the past 30 days.  2nd layer solutions like #LightningNetwork are the future for #BTC & #LTC

There is no longer an excuse for these egregious policies in LTC, hospitals and other congregate settings. My 14 y/o disabled child hasn’t seen his family in 12 weeks...when can I see my son? When will he be released from his group home that’s turned into a prison?
